Text: Anyone able to confirm real & subbed?

The torrent downloads as "Raw Hellsing X Pack" so at a minimum this is raw (poster needs to include that in the info), the files in it are "GNXA_1120.M4 & GNXA_112002.mp4"...i'm guessing FAAAAAAKE! Bad form poster, bad form.
High-ish quality video and audio, in Japanese. Odd file codec. I'm on a Mac. Opened with MPlayer OSX Extended but not with VLC or Quicktime (might open easier on PC). No sub.

To clarify
GNXA_1120.mp4 is Hellsing Ultimate X.
GNXA_112002.mp4: Seems to be a preview of something? I'm not sure, I don't speak Japanese. I haven't watched it yet, only the first few seconds; it begins with a fight between Walter and a character only introduced at the begininning of X. I didn't check how long it is, but it's 90mb as opposed to 1.1gb so I'm hoping it's a preview for something upcoming.

If a PC user has downloaded yet, do a virus check but both MP4s are Hellsing footage if you manage to get them open. I didn't virus check since I'm on a Mac so if there is any foulplay, it will be detected on a PC. Also, if someone who speaks Japanese would be willing to sub this, please do so and reupload. There doesn't seem to be a sub anywhere, only these raws.
